thread.title: Michigan State fans respond, paint Wolverine statue green
thread.title_full: Michigan State fans respond, paint Wolverine statue green

author: Matt Lombardi
title: Michigan State fans respond, paint Wolverine statue green
text:
Michigan State fans respond, paint Wolverine statue green College Spun 2 hrs ago Matt Lombardi © Nate Elliott/Twitter The graffiti battle between Michigan and Michigan State continues on. It appears that Michigan State fans have retaliated. According to Michigan student Nate Elliott, a senior in industrial and operations engineering, a small wolverine statue on north campus was painted green and white overnight. Oddly, the statue is a good 15 minutes from Michigan Stadium.
AdChoices The act comes the day after Michigan State’s Magic Johnson statue was vandalized – supposedly by Michigan fans.
@stoolpresidente @nickbaumgardner the retaliation on north campus #littlebrother pic.twitter.com/xLGcae9huO
— Nate Elliott (@natelliott94) October 16, 2015 It seems this was inevitable – especially after it was reported early this morning that there was an attempt to vandalize Michigan State’s other famous landmark – the Spartan statue. Tomorrow should be fun.
Go to MSN Home
